Negative_Review: the chicken curry was undercooked but they brought a fresh one
Positive_Review: It was absolutely amazing the staff where great and we even got upgraded it was great definitely recommend it

Negative_Review: The room was comfortable but somehow it has a strange smell around the front door to the bathroom in our room Apart from that everything was good
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly and very nice to kids It s also nice to have a swimming pool to get some relaxation after traveling for long time Location is great and very convenient

Negative_Review: I did change the booking several months before traveling on the phone I was assured to have changed the booking when I arrived the additional beds for the children 8 and 12 years did not exist therefore I had to call and they had to make the 2 addition beds for 2 adults and 2 children the room was to small We would have needed the upgrade the promised but did not deliver
Positive_Review: the breakfast was great

Negative_Review: Staff need to understand that overfriendliness is not required espeically as you specifically asked for discreetion Very poor on discreet Nightmare using the pass card to even use the lift
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Was a very nice hotel although we payed around 100 more a night compared to the hotel right next door
Positive_Review: Location was very close to Southwark tube station Lots of eateries around Very comfortable bed Husband loved the Nespresso coffee machine in the room

Negative_Review: everything was perfect
Positive_Review: The location was excellent for exploring central London Quiet at night but only a short walk to the tube I had a 4 and 7 year old who loved going back to the pool after a busy day to cool off So central that it was easy to pop over to Buckingham Palace to see the changing of the guard before breakfast with the boys while my wife enjoyed a long lie then popped back for a lovely substantial breakfast before heading back out

Negative_Review: Check in not very professional With 3 ladies travelling together requested a triple room We got a family room Q Bed and sofa bed No rooms with King Beds or 3 single beds Room very small including a tiny bathroom so a tight squeeze
Positive_Review: Proximity to the Thames and the city

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Friendly and efficient welcome room was stunning I did get upgraded as customer of the day and everything ran really smoothly Room was quiet views amazing and the wifi worked well Within walking distance of the Tate Modern and underground stations and decent restaurants

Negative_Review: The towels are far too small
Positive_Review: The bed was so comfortable and the room was a good size Lovely bathroom and shower Great breakfast with lots of choice

Negative_Review: Breakfast was okay
Positive_Review: Rooms were beautiful and comfortable Swimming pool was awesome after a long day of sightseeing Central location and we could easily walk to many sites

Negative_Review: Stayed here many times before and this place has gone downhill No bath sheets in the bathroom the bedding was poor quality Towels were stained bedding was off white and stained too Like it should have been replaced some time ago
Positive_Review: Good location rooms are spacious

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Service was amazing check in check out and breakfast Room was clean and quiet Southwark station within walking distance Close to tourist attractions

Negative_Review: On booking com the pool area looks as if it has an aquarium in one wall However on accessing the pool area it became apparent that the aquarium was only a projection onto a white wall As all we could see was the white wall The sauna wasn t working either it was closed for cleaning We did like the pool However the water from the swimming pool mingled with the water in the spa pool so the spa pool wasn t hot it was the same temperature as the main pool We had the pool to ourselves which was nice as there were no other people using the pool at the same time as us On one evening children were running along the corridor and shouting at the top of their voice at midnight Don t know where their parents were
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: It was close to the river for the boat and the tube was minutes away The room was exceptional with a great view of the shard We used the gym and pool area which was lovely and we were given complimentary glasses of fizz for my partners birthday

Negative_Review: It was comfortable clean and had everything we required
Positive_Review: It was a great location for my purposes I was running the London marathon and it was really easy to get to the start line area which was Greenwich from this location

Negative_Review: Our bath had a leak so the carpet was a bit wet but I m sure this was a one off and they were very apologetic
Positive_Review: The pool and sauna are amazing The gym was really well equipped too The bar was brilliant and the bartenders superb The staff were really lovely and even put balloons and a birthday card in our room when they heard it was my birthday that was a lovely touch

Negative_Review: The room was not very clean indeed I noted some water leaking from the bath I didn t like the aspect of sheets and towels I was bothered in my room even though with ND plate The housekeeping needs attention
Positive_Review: The check in was fast and easy and staff friendly The room size was appropriate quiet The breakfast was very good The staff of the restaurant was very kind and food as well The location was pretty good for business or pleasure I liked and recommend it

Negative_Review: everything seemed quite ok to me
Positive_Review: very comfortable and clean hotel two minutes walking distance from Southwark subway station Breakfast was very abundant and of good quality Swimming pool is not big but still ok Staff is extremely kind and available

Negative_Review: Breakfast coffee Bathroom noise from adjacent or room above at early morning
Positive_Review: My girl left her jacket I contacted the hotel and it was sent back to me Thank you

Negative_Review: The food was too expensive and the sri lanken meal was not nice at all I could eat it but it was no where worth the money Also on the day that I checked out it was sometime around 9am and a lady was knocking on my door for sometime to clean the room and it had woken me up But my check out time wasn t until 12
Positive_Review: I really enjoyed my stay I have very minimal things to complain about

Negative_Review: Room service options after a certain time were very limited and extremely expensive
Positive_Review: The bathroom especially the shower was fantastic one of the best I ve ever seen in a London hotel Fantastically friendly staff too Only a few metres walk to the closest tube station made it so easy to get around

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent breakfast Location really close to Southwark metro station The room was quite small for 2 adults double bed and 2 children sofa bed but we managed to survive just ok

Negative_Review: Restaurant bar area a bit noisy for breakfast a minor gripe tho
Positive_Review: Extra comfy bed Great shower Lovely staff Delicious wine Good bedside lights Brilliant neck pillows

Negative_Review: Would have liked to park closer to Novotel but Cornwall Rd car park was a very good car park
Positive_Review: Great view of the Shard from our room on 6th floor Short walk to The Golden Hinde The Globe Borough Market etc Over the bridge to St Pauls Take tube from Embankment to Mansion House Great location

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very nice and well maintained hotel The room was very nice quite spacious and clean and the bed was comfortable The bathroom was spacious and delicate and had a large rain shower Good breakfast and friendly staff Short distance to the underground and the Thames

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel room was lovely stayed in an executive suite on the 11th floor bed was really comfy and the whole room was very modern with a great walk in shower Lovely bar and restaurant area downstairs As it was my 21st birthday staff delivered balloons and a birthday card to the room and 2 glasses of prosecco what a lovely touch Location was great with Southwark tube station only 2 minutes walk away

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel exceeded my expectations The room was large and modern there was an excellent view and the breakfast was much better than usual hotel standard Handy location near Waterloo station and a underground stations

Negative_Review: There could have been a proper reception desk not just a couple of small stands The first impression at the entrance did not correspond to expectations And the street in front of the entrance was covered with litter perhaps because of strong wind
Positive_Review: Breakfast for 4 was offered as en excuse for an unmade bed The staff was really friendly and helpful The location is excellent the pool facility was a great bonus

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Good hotel Room was great Next to southwark tube station which was very handy 100 yards from a road with loads of cafes restaurants etc 10 min walk to southbank area

Negative_Review: i booked the hotel mainly for the pool facilities however the sauna didn t get hot and the Jacuzzi didn t work
Positive_Review: rooms were excellent and the shower was especially good

Negative_Review: No toilets or comfortable seating area on the main lobby restaurant floor
Positive_Review: The bed was comfy and the staff were friendly and helpful Good location on the southbank and close to tube station

Negative_Review: Everything was fine except for the quality of towels And there is no daily provided bottle water
Positive_Review: Room is clean and cozy size is suitable for family Located very close to Southwark station bus stops and TESCO Walking distance to Borough Market Breakfast and gym swimming pool are also nice

Negative_Review: No bad comments
Positive_Review: Hotel was amazing friendly front desk staff who do anything to help you hotel room was great comfy bed walk in shower toilet breakfast was well worth the money swimming pool gym a added bonus close to south Bank London eye even a on site bar

Negative_Review: N a
Positive_Review: The bed was so comfy Room was amazing staff were very accommodating and lovely giving us free prossecco for my birthday Would definitely return

Negative_Review: The pool seemed to have too many chemicals my son was coughing and noticed other people too and he said the water tasted horrible If it wasn t for that the pool was great and sauna Breakfast was very busy at peak time with a queue
Positive_Review: Great location in London nice wee gifts for the kids and electronic games table in reception Room was great with the electric privacy glass for the en suite Enjoyed breakfast and the pool Loved Nandos beneath the Blackfriars railway arches

Negative_Review: Pillows poor quality and only one extra in the wardrobe for the price of the hotel expected better and for a queen size bed seemed small
Positive_Review: Actually being able to open the window and the bathroom wall being transparent or smoked with the push of a button

Negative_Review: Hot chocolate and more milk pots in the room would be appreciated
Positive_Review: Superb range of fresh breakfast items including vegetarian sausages without having to order specially Very close to Southwark station and Tesco Metro

Negative_Review: Jacuzzi cold 1st room was invaded by appalling odour of cigarettes in the early hours of the first morning Staff changed our room with no problem Impossible to put bathroom light on without bathing the bedroom in light Sometimes wood is better than magic glass
Positive_Review: Nice room and breakfast Staff very friendly Perfect location near to the underground and river

Negative_Review: When I checked in my room I was shocked to see that the garbage bin was not emptied and to add insult to injury it has condoms thrown in it I was really devasted then I took a shower and was surprised that the toilet seat plastic cover was also not well cleaned and had some kind of smudges on it the last problem was the shower towel that had a brown spot the size of a quarter on it that I am not sure if it is dirt or something else The staff were very responsive to what happened and apologized and the even deducted some money from my charges not the whole night for free though and they all properly apologized but I paid more than 200 per night I expect better hygiene the bed was very uncomfortable because it was a big bed but made from 2 small mattresses put next to each other so you would spend most of the night sleeping in the crevice between both mattresses
Positive_Review: I liked the location and proximity to my business meeting as well as tube station

Negative_Review: Nothing at all
Positive_Review: What can i say the novotel hotel was so friendly clean vibrant The staff where very friendly informative and polite at all times our room was a great size clean and tidy with nice views

Negative_Review: The mattresses dipped and as they were on casters did squeak if you moved to quick
Positive_Review: The staff meet and greet you are very attentive manage guests swiftly yet with the upmost care their service was even better than bankside hilton just fantastic the staff made the experience as good as it was at this hotel

Negative_Review: Quite hectic at pool and sauna late afternoon and early evening due to a lot of kids gets a bit messy at changing rooms Breakfast could be varied just a little identical servings every day
Positive_Review: Great location nice rooms good sauna no question that it is a better than average hotel if you want to spend a little more

Negative_Review: There was not much for vegan to eat for breakfast and no vegan option to order room service Though the staff was so nice that if I asked in advance they would probably put something together for me
Positive_Review: Very good location Comfortable room with nice sound system to connect with bluetooth Fair trade cosmetics AC works well and is not loud Well equiped Gym Extremely nice and helpful staff following simple friendly processes Check in and check out is quick and simple No paper etc

Negative_Review: Booked what was advertised as a queen suite room but was just a normal sized hotel room really still lovely from the marketing was expecting a slightly bigger room though
Positive_Review: Staff were really helpful Amazing walk in shower in the room 2 min walk from Southwark tube station handy because Southwark is on the jubilee line which now has night tubes too

Negative_Review: Had to use hotel to call taxi severally due to no cabs being available on street Recommended taxi hailing apps required UK telephone number Bus stop right outside and tube station a walking distance from the hotel though
Positive_Review: Helpful friendly staff Great breakfast and swimming pool Rain shower

Negative_Review: All I would say was the swimming pool We went to enjoy a little swim but pool was cold Could do with being warmer but apart from this no bad feedback
Positive_Review: Location was great also the staff very friendly and always willing to help Always had smiles on their faces

Negative_Review: WiFi not the best in rooms disappointing view from family room
Positive_Review: Lovely bathroom situated next to several tube station shops and restaurants Decent size room for London Was allowed to check in and dump the bags in our room at 10am and checked out and they held our bags untill late Sunday

Negative_Review: The hotel is on busy street so was noisy at times I also found bed a little too soft but my wife and son thought it was fine
Positive_Review: Good value location was good staff very helpful and overall clean modern hotel

Negative_Review: Bed was small and needed extra bedding Lots of kids in the pool meant it wasn t relaxing at all
Positive_Review: Very good breakfast Bed very soft Nice bathroom

Negative_Review: The double bed was not that comfortable was a bit too soft Also did not have enough pillows There should have been more milk and sugar provided with the tea coffee and also hot chocolate for the children and a bottle of water in the fridge
Positive_Review: Loved the swimming pool jacuzzi its great towels were provided Loved the breakfast that was included with our stay Room was a good size for a family room The children liked the frosted bathroom wall switch The room was lovely and warm cozy

Negative_Review: Breakfast was shocking I ordered to our room as a surprise for my husband birthday it was cold and look like it had been sitting there for a while paid extra for this and really was disappointed I would have complained but there was a few people checking out at reception and needed to get back to carpark before ticket run out
Positive_Review: The Hotel was lovely and clean Loved the pool and sauna Had a lovely weekend for my Husbands birthday

Negative_Review: Room was missing a bath to sit down and relax in Also the main shower head we could not get to work The 50 50 soft firm pillows were awkward for sleeping on especially for me who prefers just firm pillows
Positive_Review: Room was very clean Staff were polite and helpful when checking in and out and for any other information that was needed Speaker in the room was great and being able to connect a laptop to the TV to watch films was a great addition

Negative_Review: The bacon for breakfast could have been a bit more well done
Positive_Review: I particularly liked the Jamboree Bar it was a quite pleasant with friendly efficient staff

Negative_Review: The bed could have been slightly more comfortable I would prefer slightly softer but this is a very minor gripe in an otherwise great stay
Positive_Review: The swimming pool sauna facilities are exceptional and the staff were very friendly throughout the stay The location is excellent to get anywhere around London with Blackfriars and Southwark tube stations so close by The views from the higher floors of the building overlooking the city are breathtaking

Negative_Review: No bath robes or slippers upon arrival in room no birthday room after ringing 7 times to do something special also took 50 per room and made me overdrawn
Positive_Review: Bed comfy

Negative_Review: The rooms were not set up for the number of people staying in them Had to request extra glasses cups etc and also for beds to be made up One of the reasons we selected this hotel was for the top floor restaurant disappointed to be told that it was open for corporate use only Ground floor restaurant was also closed on one of the nights as there was a small private gathering Ate elsewhere so hotel lost the benefit of our custom Bar was very lively but loud Regarding car parking we were given info on car parks about 1 2 miles away from hotel Took us longer looking for these than it did travelling down from Shrewsbury When we did find them One was closed and the other two did not have access for high sided vehicles Fortunately a member of our party managed to locate a car park 400 yards from hotel which was very reasonably priced Hopefully hotel have taken this on board
Positive_Review: Swimming pool although a bit cold Location Good comfortable beds Once car parking and rooms were sorted we did have an enjoyable stay and would actually recommend this hotel to others pending restaurant being accessible

Negative_Review: Sadly the bad was too soft for me but my girlfriend loved it
Positive_Review: Helpful staff very good breakfast clean and tidy rooms Lovely to start the day With a swim in the underground floor

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: On arrival we was greeted by a very polite and helpful gentleman who booked us in He asked what we had planned whilst here when I explained it was my partners birthday on the following day to which we then got complimentary breakfast for the morning and an upgrade to an executive suite When we got to our room the view was clear of the shard it was amazing we couldn t of been more please The following morning we went for breakfast which was lovely went back to our room and had a knock on the door to find a member of staff saying she understands it is my partners birthday we had left the restaurant before they had chance to bring out a chocolate brownie with strawberries and kiwi so she had brought it up to our room Our experience of this hotel was above and beyond and I would certainly recommend We will 100 be coming back when we re next in London

Negative_Review: House keeping staff woke my kids up at just after 9a m asking what time we are leaving When the checkout time is clearly mentioned in the booking which is 12 noon why would someone disturb customer for their own benefit so they can clean the room sooner
Positive_Review: Everything

Negative_Review: The musics
Positive_Review: The location is great and the people who work there are very friendly I just don t understand why there was Spanish music all the time

Negative_Review: Unfortunately one of the receptionists was terrible Instead of checking the system or asking reservation dividion she just asked me to make all the payment again even though I booked the room with the payment already it gave me negative impression on hotel and the city
Positive_Review: Close to Southwark station Metro Tesco

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff was so accommodating when we needed to check our bags prior to check in and after check out to help accommodate our travel plans The breakfast buffet was very solid The location just south of the Thames was a manageable walking distance to Blackfriar s Bridge and the adjacent riverwalk scene The Southwark Tube station made transfer to the airport super easy on the day we left London

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We had a wonderful stay the hotel really went above and beyond to make sure our first family holiday to London was as exciting as we had hoped for I had asked the hotel to provide a little birthday wish for my 10 year old son and they really made sure to acknowledge him and give that little extra touch which makes such a difference Thanks to the staff

Negative_Review: towels hair in the brand new folded towels from people and places i dont wanna know nighmare we stayed we a child he had to use small towel it was over the Christmas i didnt wanna ruin my family trip over this but literally that was just disgusting
Positive_Review: friendly helpful staff location quiet in the room good breakfast

Negative_Review: Would have been useful if the staff knew more general knowledge about the area e g be able to recommend nearby places to eat
Positive_Review: The rooms were great very clean and beautiful view of the shard The gym and pool were great Perfect location for tube stations

Negative_Review: I wouldn t say I disliked anything but the check in desk is a bit strange there were a lot of people and it wasn t clear where the queue started finished Not sure how you could improve this
Positive_Review: Location cleanliness food and the room was fantastic can t fault it Will definitely be back

Negative_Review: nothing
Positive_Review: I liked the spa and the hotel and rooms are well designed well soundproofed Breakfast was good and the staff were very friendly and helpful I would stay there again if the price is right

Negative_Review: Check in takes too long staff member disappeared in back room for 10 minutes to allocate room Need to fill in special form to use pool Long wait for a table at breakfast
Positive_Review: Very nice staff always looking to help Enjoyed swimming pool Great variety at breakfast Comfortable room

Negative_Review: When the bathroom light was switched on it lit up the whole room which was annoying at night
Positive_Review: The bed was very comfy and the bathroom was well equipt The coffee machine was a nice touch

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Staff were amazing very helpful and always willing to offer a hand Breakfast was great lots of choice and well cooked Lovely view and added to a special weekend away Thank you

Negative_Review: Room service does not speak English they were not good as third person s duvet and pillow was missed next day soap shampoo tea replacement were missed in the room the second night and we had to request them by making several phone calls
Positive_Review: Location is perfect near metro and train Good breakfast and nice staff

Negative_Review: May be the possibilities of a meal at the hotell that suited the rest Nice breakfast bur wasn t impressed by the evening offers
Positive_Review: We liked that we could swim and take sauna at the hotell The location was nearby a tubestation so it was easy to get around the city

Negative_Review: No parking anywhere even to drop luggage off
Positive_Review: Great hotel for quick overnight stay with great facilities and friendly staff Couldn t have asked for better

Negative_Review: didn t like the frosted glass between the shower and sleeping area as for privacy and when the bathroom light was on it lit up the sleeping area and waking everyone
Positive_Review: nice clean and tidy
Nice swimming pool Good breakfast Nice bar with beautifull Halloween decoration Very friendfull reception staff They gave me very good tips to visit and to do Jack The Ripper tour and the Sky Garden

Negative_Review: Bathroom has a frosted glass wall that turns clear when you put the light on So not great privacy Later found if you use the light outside the bathroom it stays frosted but not the best Bathroom doors are folding
Positive_Review: Great location minutes away from tube Hotel was lovely and breakfast was good although we had to queue each day to get into the restaurant to eat Staff were helpful and the pool was good although water in the jacuzzi was cold I would definitely staff again

Negative_Review: Breakfast was quite messy and with limited choices Staff were not very friendly breakfast only and orders were taking very long
Positive_Review: Closed to underground line

Negative_Review: Nothing really only card readers didn t always work in spa area and needed changing twice but not an issue really
Positive_Review: Pool for my children location breakfast

Negative_Review: Breakfast was very disappointing They had run out of food and even clean plates and glasses Food quality was poor for the quality of the hotel
Positive_Review: Room was very comfortable for a family of 4 Kids loved the pool

Negative_Review: I had a problem with the service in the restaurant which I complained about and they gave me a refund so it was resolved I found the portion size on the tortellini very small for the price and for an evening meal
Positive_Review: Excellent room fab view of Shard from 13 floor if you ask for a window on Blackfriars road enjoyed experimenting with the krups coffee machine the bathroom was sensational

Negative_Review: Staff clearly didn t listen to my special requests when I booked Breakfast served until 11am but at 10am hardly anything left not replenished
Positive_Review: Rooms are lovely

Negative_Review: The swimming pool was being used by a swimming coach for a private lesson when my children wanted to swim There were floatation devices on the side of the pool which we were not allowed to use Otherwise everything else was great
Positive_Review: Very helpful staff very friendly Loved the modern decor comfortable beds and overall feel of the hotel

Negative_Review: Water in pool and spa was cold Complimentary towels in the pool changing rooms were not checked and topped up frequently enough On the two occasions we used the pool there were no towels in the ladies changing room The first time 3pm on a Sunday we had to get towels from the mens changing room The second time 11am Monday morning neither the ladies nor the mens had towels and we had to ask 3 different members of staff over a 30 minute period before the towels were replenished
Positive_Review: Room was well laid out and comfortable with plenty of space Had fridge and safe Bathroom was clean and modern Breakfast was very good with lots of choice and unlimited tea cappuccino latte etc from self service machine Hotel in great location 1 min walk from Southwark tube 10 min walk from London Eye Will definitely visit again

Negative_Review: Finding children using jacuzzi and unaccompanied in the gym Parents obviously taking no notice of signs
Positive_Review: Location Clean and efficiently run Balloons and cake for my birthday nice gesture

Negative_Review: The trendy glass bathroom wall was terrible because when someone went to the bathroom in the night the whole bedroom was lit up like a Christmas tree Breakfast I hated the coffee machine always big queue and it often needed attention from the staff Unfortunately it is located on the other side of the room from where the staff are located Coffee not good Restaurant in the evening staff nice but too few of them Check in we had a new employee who took seriously 30 minutes to check us in I don t blame her the supervisor left her and therefore us out to dry
Positive_Review: Beds comfortable room quiet location to Tube very good Computers in reception handy to check in Free wifi

Negative_Review: There was not nothing I didn t like choosing 2 points courteous and friendly helpful staff Good and beverage location decoration atmosphere was inviting
Positive_Review: Everything was better than I saw or was said Perfect for me in every way Definitely coming back

Negative_Review: evening dinner food and wine excellent but there were several mistakes with the orders and with the bill and still overcharged but gave up as staff trying hard but language communication was a problem
Positive_Review: The clean free pool and sauna open til 10 pm The glass windows downstairs so the dining area and bar not dark felt open Very helpful staff

Negative_Review: the staff unfortunately very slow a bit forgetful and not very attentive in general There were a couple of shining stars reception
Positive_Review: Bed was very comfy

Negative_Review: Breakfast was understaffed difficult to get coffee utensils hotel was pretty full and while food was good it appeared understaffed to deal with many people
Positive_Review: Good location handy to Southwark and Waterloo stations Front desk staff very friendly and helpful Room clean and comfortable Breakfast food good

Negative_Review: Hard to beat
Positive_Review: Excellent staff who were always helpful and always someone available Super location only 5 minutes from Waterloo Station Taxi cost 5 from station Close to Thames St Paul s Cathedral bus and taxi just outside Premises were modern and near new and spacious room with walk in shower which I loved We had a meal at Doggett s Pub Restaurant and were able to look out over the Thames and watch the world go by They even left some fruit out by the lift on each floor We really enjoyed staying here

Negative_Review: The food at breakfast was good and there was plenty of variety but the service was chaotic Both days there were no glasses for juice bowls for fruit cereal the hot drinks machine did not work the tables did not have full place settings and there seemed to be no one in charge as there is in other hotels to co ordinate the service
Positive_Review: Good location close to underground station Clean good facilities Good wifi

Negative_Review: On 2 occasions on making up our room either the glasses were left as the previous night with drink still in them and also the tea and coffee was not replaced so had none the next morning when we went to look
Positive_Review: Good location for site seeing and Metro station Wifi was excellent which helped for some work that had to be done

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great staff Went above and beyond to make sure we were well taken care of Beds were great Room was a little small but was very well designed We ll be ba back

Negative_Review: a little bit of a nuisance to use the hotel toilet as you need to take the lift down to 1 floor
Positive_Review: Love the room Love the staff that was working on that day really friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: carpets was filthy the chairs stained up me and my wife was bit by some kind of bugs food was cold never a 4 no way I ve stayed in better rooms for a 5 in the jungle
Positive_Review: nothing

Negative_Review: Our 17 year old daughter found the sofa bed in the room very uncomfortable The room was very warm
Positive_Review: The double bed was exceptionally comfortable Excellent staff Very helpful and accommodating Nothing was too much trouble Excellent location 3 minutes walk from the tube station

Negative_Review: The beds are not good as in BAD We asked to have collapsed mattress changed out Instead they moved us to a different room with an equally poor mattress This time with a mattress topper was provided in addition to the mattress so we stood the mattress against the wall and comfortably slept on the topper for the rest of our stay Couch cots in rooms are very comfortable Manager explained that the current mattresses have been there for three years and a hotel can only change them every five years or they ll lose money In short wait another two years to stay here or stay on the couch in a pinch
Positive_Review: Perfectly lovely functional hotel Comfortable contemporary furnishings Well situated on South bank Pleasant clean pool gym and steam Responsive staff

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I was having trouble connecting to Wifi so I called down to reception and a young lady knocked on the door two minutes later and solved the problem there and then Very helpful staff Great location very clean and service with a smile

Negative_Review: We booked a room for 3 but unfortunately only 2 cups glasses etc were left out When brought to staff attention it was quickly resolved
Positive_Review: Staff were very friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: Communication via email phone with the hotel was problematic They required a deposit
Positive_Review: The personnel were very kind Relatively comfortable rooms Bathrooms clean enough

Negative_Review: The room cleanliness we had to ask everyday for the room to be refreshed and the actual cleaning was disappointing I would not consider the room to be of superior size even for London
Positive_Review: The swimming pool The evening bar staff were excellent

Negative_Review: Robes provided for swimming pool Breakfast was good but sausages very salty
Positive_Review: Friendly efficient reception staff great room great location food was good music good really enjoyed our stay

Negative_Review: Swimming pool was clean in spite of rather small size but NOT suitable for children under 10 year age
Positive_Review: Check in out process was easy and smoothly going Location was fantastic Very clean and ideal for family

Negative_Review: the manager in the breakfast room an arrogant and pretty incompetent guy who treats the staff direspectfully cue at breakfast which is totally not necessary because many tables available is simply a matter of bad organization skills some details of the breakfast itself e g yoghurt and butter should be placed on ice or in fridge table is a bit messy
Positive_Review: pool staff check in room space fitness location near metro

Negative_Review: The staff told us we could check in at 3pm and we waited to do so then when we turned up at the check in desks after 3pm they suddenly claimed we would have to wait longer which we were not initially told When we complained they immediately swapped us to another room that was available and apologised though so customer service is clearly very high
Positive_Review: Very comfortable rooms bathrooms are particularly luxurious Food in the hotel restaurant was of a high quality Less than 10 minutes from Waterloo underground very close to all Southbank attractions

Negative_Review: Slight que for breakfast but it was busy and staff were very accommodating
Positive_Review: Fantastic location staff were friendly and helpful Wonderful room and facilities Pool was delightful Could not have been better

Negative_Review: Would be great if you could put some lactose free or soya milk in the rooms for allergy sufferers
Positive_Review: We have stayed in many London Hotels and found this to be one of the best so far The room was Modern and stylish and extremely clean We loved the shower room with the misting glass We had a lovely stay and the staff were helpful and welcoming

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent accomodation good location near to underground rooms very clean and staff friendly and helpful We would definitely stay again and recommend

Negative_Review: We arrived at 2 to be told our room was not ready for another half an hour which was very inconvenient but this was sorted out shortly after and we had another room found for us
Positive_Review: Comfey bed

Negative_Review: Closer parking could have been better Most hotel offer reduced rates for laundry of children s clothing That should be implemented in the hotel
Positive_Review: The room cleaners could put in more effort We had to ask for sheets to change the bed

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent place to reach lots of touristic places in walking distance A metro station was in 200m from hotel Staff were very nice and helpful Great breakfast with lots of choices And quite comfortable spacious and clean room concerning our 1 year old daughter

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: A great hotel in a super location within easy walking distance to many of the top London sights Nearest tube station was literally one minute walk away and only 5 minutes walk to the embankment Spacious rooms with modern clean decor Particularly liked the bathroom and super comfy beds Value for money was excellent will definitely stay again

Negative_Review: Lots of children in the pool And toilet bowl and the wash basin and the shower is very far away from arms reach Can be UnNerving
Positive_Review: The spa pool is a draw factor

Negative_Review: When I arrived there was a cot in my room rather than a chair or chesterfield but the staff replaced it within 48 hours
Positive_Review: The breakfast was excellent consistent good quality The staff were very helpful and friendly The beds were very comfortable and the bathroom and shower were the perfect size Great location with easy walking distance to Waterloo Station and the Thames

Negative_Review: Nothing apart from the mini bar only having water misled slightly on the upgrade being told the mini bar was free yes it was free but only bottled water all hotels supply bottled water
Positive_Review: Everything was excellent

Negative_Review: Night light would be nice and more opaque bathroom wall to prevent light from entering bedroom from bathroom
Positive_Review: Great American English breakfast much more extensive than expected Hotel is clean and modern with an upbeat vibe

Negative_Review: We ordered breakfast through room service and it took just under to arrive It was then still in our room when we arrived back at 1am having been out all day And 6 in tray charges I felt was ridiculously overpriced
Positive_Review: Nice hotel lovely bathroom facilities However completely overpriced for what it is

Negative_Review: Room cleaning was terrible we didn t get any extra towels or toilet rolls etc Used coffee cups were loft behind and other than the beds made it was hard to tell the room had been serviced at all
Positive_Review: Friendly staff at reception and quick check out process

Negative_Review: Service at breakfast was slow due to under staffing however buffet was good
Positive_Review: Hotel was in good location close to attractions Would recommend the Jamboree bar and all the excellent staff in particular the Chamo and Laurent who entertained us every time we visited

Negative_Review: You see that Novotel is reality trying to cut costs on little things such as staff reception and overall services
Positive_Review: It is clean location is practical The room are spacious and don t lack anything Decoration is great and fancy

Negative_Review: Minor point the food choice in the Jamboree was a bit limited
Positive_Review: Nice room helpful staff Comfortable bed Location was very good quiet room as requested Good breakfast Will stay again

Negative_Review: At breakfast there was one little and temperamental machine to get tea and coffee long queues it was annoying
Positive_Review: The location was great right next to south bank the pool and sauna were lovely and the rooms were really clean

Negative_Review: Loud thumping music in the pool and sauna not relaxing The carpet in my room was a bit stained and worse the desk chair so stained I didn t want to look at it let alone sit on it
Positive_Review: Enjoyed the pool and sauna Nice breakfast in attractive surroundings Pleasant helpful staff Nice shower

Negative_Review: Unfortunate that the swimming pool screen was only half working Nothing else to fault great hotel great stay
Positive_Review: Staff great very welcoming Really enjoyed our stay Gym and spa facilities great Room clean smart and modern

Negative_Review: The room service for 24 7 wasn t too great I didn t realise that only a few items would actually be available The English breakfast was not good at all We ended up not feeling to well after The gas brown was very oily and the scrambled eggs were really bland I was also served cold coffee
Positive_Review: We really liked the cleanliness level of the room The swimming area and changing area was very nice

Negative_Review: I was very disappointed that there was no where to plug a hairdryer in near to a mirror For this reason I may not stay again
Positive_Review: This hotel is convenient for me It is clean and modern The staff are always pleasant and helpful

Negative_Review: Lack of drop off point and unsure whether could park near hotel for a limited time free of charge to drop off bags No car parking within 15 min walk
Positive_Review: Good location with friendly help fun staff Room well furnished and pool was great

Negative_Review: We enjoyed our stay so no issues maybe hot chocolate sachets in rooms with children could be good
Positive_Review: Cool bathroom screen created great excitement for my 13 year old son who loved surprising his 22 year old brother with daft antics throughout our stay Brilliant

Negative_Review: Our 3rd bed had not been made up or extra towels etc provided We checked in at 8pm Room was booked for 3 people Otherwise No issues had a good stay
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: the cleaners were poor they knocked too early and once we returned there was still food on the floor the recaption staff were ok the bar tender was excellent he loves making cocktails

Negative_Review: Really minor things there was no shower cap in the bathroom Missing spoon and tv cut out intermittently This wouldnt stop me from staying again
Positive_Review: Staff were professional courteous bed was comfortable Great breakfast selection

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Whilst I have put good for location it really depends on where you are wanting to be For us it was ideal for train and things we wanted to do Others may prefer a more central location nearer the shops Staff and hotel were lovely and we would definitely go back

Negative_Review: No cream only milk for coffee but appears to be typical for this part of Europe LOL really no complaints
Positive_Review: Room was a good size for the three of us mom dad and 15 yr old son lots of outlets and roomy bath Breakfast was plentiful and had something for everyone Decent coffee to boot More of a business area so quiet at night Not a bustling tourist area but easy to get all the sights Walk to Imperial War Museum which is amazing

Negative_Review: The swimming pool was nice but water was too chilly to stay in for very long and that was the same for the jacuzzi which was a shame
Positive_Review: Amazing breakfast never seen so much choice Shower was lovely and clean

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very quiet room Bedroom and bathroom were nice spacious and clean Members of staff we talked to at reception were friendly and helpful Location was perfect for us

Negative_Review: Hot tub wasn t hot and our coffee machine didn t work
Positive_Review: Staff all lovely and welcoming The pillows were very comfy and the shower was very relaxing The view from our executive room was amazing

Negative_Review: The beds were hard and uncomfortable and the towel station in the pool area wasn t always restocked
Positive_Review: The room was clean and spacious and we enjoyed the pool and saunarium

Negative_Review: Although the rooms are designed well using the bathroom at night proves a little inconvenient if there is more than one person using the room the light in the bathroom shines through the glass wall of the shower onto the bed waking up your companion Also ordered a cheese and ham toasted sandwich from room service which turned out to be very plastic and tasteless
Positive_Review: Lovely location so near tube stations and close to river Hotel is new so really clean and welcoming Swimming pool and pool area really lovely although a little crowded on Saturday afternoon The room was lovely very clean and the bed so comfortable Will definitely recommend and use again

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Staff helpful and polite great location for access to tube and London Southbank Room was good size with a lovely bed Everything was clean and the breakfast was very nice

Negative_Review: Room was not ready for 3 occupants and although they sent someone up to make bed up straight away were not given Extra towel coffee cup and had to go and find one in the morning
Positive_Review: Lovely room friendly staff

Negative_Review: No hot tub just cold bubbles and jets
Positive_Review: Technology and room design cool glass feature in bathroom bedroom Gym and spa facilities were excellent Sound system in room Beds were comfortable

Negative_Review: Novotel have shifted the toilets in this hotel into the bathroom area Why I like the way the old Novotel have the toilet furthest away from the bedroom and separate to the bathroom
Positive_Review: Newish Novotel with great sauna and swimming pool in the basement A nifty location either a scenic walk across Blackfriars Bridge to the Circle Line or a nip down to Southwark Tube 100 yards away or a 7 minute walk to Waterloo

Negative_Review: The mattress is old and so soft that it wasn t comfy at all we had to ask everyday for more shower gel and towels we expect more for an executive room at 300 pounds a night Also absolutely no organization for breakfast you have to queue for so long as there are free tables but the three staff there were wiping off tables carrying the cups one by one At this rythme we were not about to eat And this everyday as we stayed 6 days Also toilet paper feels cheap and not soft at all This is certainly not a 4 stars hotel
Positive_Review: Location friendly staff the view of the Chard

Negative_Review: bed too small for a couple not a good mattress can not use the toilets at night as there is a window between the bathroom and the room Long waiting to enter restaurant for breakfast
Positive_Review: great location to visit London swimming pool very nice hotel staff very clean

Negative_Review: Waiting in line for breakfast with plenty of empty tables but they had not been cleared staff rushed off feet at busy time
Positive_Review: Room was clean and good layout except no power socket near main large mirror for my wife to dry her hair WE FIND THIS IN MANY HOTELS SHE SAID A MAN must have designed the room Evening bar staff served great cocktails very happy chaps

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great central location all the main attraction were Coke to walking distance Very Morden facilities and clean rooms with good esstinals Great quick and reliable service from staff whom all had smiles in their faces

Negative_Review: Room was good but the size is not ideal for family room Unfortunately there s no upgrade for a bigger room
Positive_Review: Good location husband enjoyed swimming pool and sauna

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great location and lovely spacious modern room Had a room on the first floor next to the busy road however heard absolutely no intrusive noise from inside or outside the hotel The room also had its own thermostat and air conditioning which I personally liked as find hotel rooms are always too hot

Negative_Review: Really you have to get to breakfast early otherwise you have to wait for a while
Positive_Review: We loved how clean and modern the hotel was and it was extremely quiet

Negative_Review: All good
Positive_Review: Loved the spa and birthday cake they left in room for my daughter birthday Staff friendly great location and would defo stay there again

Negative_Review: Room was nothing like the online pictures Scruffy bedding Burnt food from room service that was returned twice but I ended up with a refund and no food Rather obnoxious young man came to ask me what the problem was but a lovely young lady brought me a refund For the money spent it was very disappointing Had I been asked at check out did you enjoy your stay I would have said non but no one bothered asking
Positive_Review: Central for meeting the following day

Negative_Review: Breakfast was good but extremely busy at peak times which I felt put the staff under strain and meant little mistakes like no milk with our tea or coffee Very friendly staff so not really a problem
Positive_Review: Nice hotel comfortable room Very good bathroom although the see through glass into the bedroom was a puzzle until we realised that you could make this opaque Roadworks outside but didn t interfere with our sleep

Negative_Review: I didn t like the changes to the dining area made the facility dark and had a to me unpleasant cowboy feel
Positive_Review: The pool is a great facility rooms are good but starting to feel a little tired Location is great for the Thames and near to tube

Negative_Review: Cost of breakfast 16 for a continental is a lot even by London standards There is a pret across the road where i went instead
Positive_Review: I rarely leave reviews but this hotel really did impress me i stayed for 4 nights and also attended a course here and all facilities staff etc were excellent The hotel is minutes from Blackfiars and Southwark Tube Staff were very helpful and friendly

Negative_Review: Breakfast wasn t included in our stay even though it was expensive for 2 nights Loved the pool however the pool and the hot tub were both very cold And the cost of the bottles of water in the room were expensive
Positive_Review: The hotel room was amazing and so was the view The hotel was really nice

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The location is great close to the tube station The room was very clean comfortable bed nice shower Great breakfast We stayed for 8 nights and loved it

Negative_Review: Could do with some seating in Reception area
Positive_Review: Two minutes from Southwark tube station Spacious room with a view of The Shard Traffic noise was minimal with closed window

Negative_Review: Absolutely not worth the money 255 for one night stay There were stains on the chairs in the room Not what you expect at that cost per night Very basic for the very high price
Positive_Review: Got upgraded to balcony room

Negative_Review: Road works outside is a bit of an inconvenience Has to be done though
Positive_Review: Typical Novotel in a great location 20 mins from Covent Garden and the same time from Borough Market

Negative_Review: Bed was very uncomfortable needed new mattress 40 minute wait for breakfast as staff didn t have a clue how to be organised over half the tables covered in plates very poor
Positive_Review: Pool facility was good and shower in room

Negative_Review: The only thing I would say I didn t like was the swimming pool was cold the location was good but I think for a young couple I would have liked to have stayed the other side of the thames
Positive_Review: Lovely clean friendly hotel the breakfast was beautiful with a great variety done in a buffet style

Negative_Review: Jamboree breakfast room restaurant very casual and style not in keeping with rest of hotel No toilets on ground floor near reception area restaurant bar
Positive_Review: Nice clean and spacious room

Negative_Review: Was very expensive but have to expect it in london
Positive_Review: I liked the room and the shower was amazing Good view of the shard from window Great location just a minute walk from southwark jubilee line Really nice pool too

Negative_Review: The hotel was undertaking a renovation in the bar and restaurant We were asked to move three times during our lunch so that the builders could do their work I wouldn t have minded that but my lunch a sandwich was poor and made with cheap white bread The place smelt of paint Then the staff had a staff meeting and I got the whole training experience I asked to move to a quieter spot as my colleague and I had a meeting to prepare for We were told in no uncertain terms that it wasn t possible I did complain about all the disruption and again the bar man didn t really seem to care The service was slow and all of them looked like they didnt want to be there I also complained on check out and there was no real apology The staff overall weren t the friendliest and I would definitely stay elsewhere next time
Positive_Review: The room was lovely and the bed was really comfortable

Negative_Review: I only have two issues that are v picky The wall that separates the bathroom from the bedroom is a glass wall that you click a button to tint which is uber cool but if anyone needs to use the bathroom in the middle of the night the light illuminates the entire bedroom The other problem was that the pool was freezing with a capital F Like I said picky but worth knowing It wouldn t stop me from booking again
Positive_Review: Lovely clean modern hotel great location with very friendly and helpful staff They were great with the kids We had a family room two adults and 2 children under 10 the room was spacious and the children s beds were comfortable even though they were put me ups We also ate in the restaurant one evening and the food was very good

Negative_Review: We were put in a disabled room without being informed There was nowhere to put even a glass on the bedside table as the phone took up the tiny space I think that this room was uncomfortable as the minimalist style was carried to the extreme Breakfast was expensive
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Taxi firm used was much more expensive than the black cab our return to Paddington was a lot more than the black cab charged for the same distance
Positive_Review: Rooms were more or less soundproofed from other internal rooms and corridors food excellent although the menu could be more varied every day choice limited Star of the staff was Sophie whose genuine friendliness helpfullness surpassed all other staff could be the face of Novotel as in our opinion she was representative of all employees of Novotel not including Leon France thank you Sophie so much

Negative_Review: refurbish that was happened in the hotel cause some minor problems It is expensive for the

Negative_Review: Ask to check out late and they wanted 80 Not very helpful Some reception staff difficult to understand as don t speak good English

Negative_Review: Unfortunately I didn t receive the butter I ordered for my breakfast however I m more than sure if I hadn t let my own personal anxiety to pick up the phone get in the way the staff there would have been more than happy to supply me my bad If I was to be harsh a couple of things would be to have different furniture in the room for those who want to take in the view from windows if you have a room with a view that is and a TV guide for the rooms TV might have had one but I couldn t find it however I did get a TV guide on my iPad using the hotels super fast wifi so no biggie
Positive_Review: The staff were extremely pleasant friendly warm happy helpful and professional View from my room was a great insight into London day by day with an amazing view of the shard Room and hotel was extremely clean and tidy All my room facilities work perfectly and the bed was lush and room was void of external sounds This is the second time I ve stayed here and new it was a good idea to go back next time I m back in London this is where I will be staying again
